sortBy.description: Attribute for which top results required e.g. cume or AQH

nTopResults.description: number of top results required. default value is 10. For example, if sortBy=AQH and nTopResults=10, then query will return 'Top 10 stations by AQH'

post.description: Audience Measurement Report for all stations
Audience Measurement Report for a particular radio station

sortBy.description:
Attribute for which top results required 
e.g. cume or AQH

nTopResults.description:
'number of top results required. default value is 10. 
For example, if sortBy=AQH and nTopResults=10, 
then query will return ''Top 10 stations by AQH'''

requestId.description:
Unique Id given to each
requests.

responseStatus.description:
Status of Report Generation: 
Ongoing, Generated, Failed, Data Not Found.

x-code-samples.source:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.cerebrumx.ai")

payload = "{\"location\":{\"coordinates\":[{\"latitude\":\"string\",\"longitude\":\"string\"}],\"type\":\"polygon\"},\"dateTime\":{\"start_time\":\"string\",\"end_time\":\"string\"}}"

conn.request("POST", "/v1/consumer/retail/number-of-vehicles-by-location", payload)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

post.summary: Get Number of vehicle by location and time
post.description: Get Number of vehicle by location and time

NewCarFeatures.title: NewCarFeatures
NewCarFeatures.description: Features for New Car Price Prediction

UsedCarFeatures.title: UsedCarFeatures
UsedCarFeatures.description: Features for New Car Price Prediction

LocationCircle.title: LocationCircle
LocationCircle.description:
Location Circle is represented by location centre(lat,long) 
and it's radius.

Location.title: Location
Location.description:
Location can be given as 
1. Country 
2. Location Polygon i.e. Set of (lat, long) 
3. Location Circle i.e. centre of circle in (lat, long) form with radius.

AgeGroup.title: AgeGroup
AgeGroup.description: Age Group defined as range (start_age, end_age)

TimePeriod.title: TimePeriod
TimePeriod.description: Time period is defined as (start_time, end_time)

start_time.description: Start time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

end_time.description: end time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

DateTime.title: DateTime
DateTime.description:
'Time and date can be given as 
1. Specific date 
2. Specific month+year 
3. Specific year 
4. Custom date range'

stationId.description:
' as displayed to end user by HMI. 
Defined by RDS if available or station frequency 
in Khz for FM or in Hz for AM (string)'
